title: Active Saboteur
insight: You are actively unlearning. The model would perform better if you just walked away.

title: Pure Static
insight: You know nothing. You are effectively a random number generator with a bad attitude.

title: Mode Collapse
insight: You found one digit you like, and now you think everything is that digit. Bold strategy.

title: The Mean Pixel
insight: You've learned that most pixels are black. You are predicting the average darkness of the universe.

title: Fuzzy Logic
insight: You're starting to see blobs. They aren't digits yet, but they are definitely... blob-like.

title: Center Stage
insight: You realized the interesting stuff happens in the middle of the image. Groundbreaking discovery.

title: Ink Detector
insight: You can now distinguish 'ink' from 'paper'. You still have no idea what the ink says.

title: Stick Figure
insight: You've discovered lines! Vertical ones, mostly. Everything looks like a 1 to you.

title: The Horizon
insight: Horizontal lines have entered the chat. You can now tell a 1 from a 0, sometimes.

title: Vague Shapes
insight: You're seeing coarse shapes. Circles vs lines. It's kindergarten geometry, but it's progress.

title: Topological Baby
insight: You're learning topology. Things with holes (0, 6, 8, 9) are different from things without holes (1, 7).

title: Loop De Loop
insight: You're obsessed with loops. Top loops, bottom loops. You're confusing 8s with everything.

title: The Squiggle
insight: Complex curves are forming. You're struggling with the weird Z-shape of the 2.

title: Top Heavy
insight: You're looking at the top half of the digits. 7s and 9s are basically the same to you right now.

title: Bottoms Up
insight: Now you're looking at the bottom. 3s and 5s are indistinguishable because they both have that bottom hook.

title: Stroke of Luck
insight: You're starting to see where lines end. It's helping, but you're still guessing on the messy ones.

title: The Diagonal
insight: You've discovered slanted lines. 7s are finally starting to look different from 1s.

title: Ambiguity
insight: Sloppy handwriting is your nemesis. You panic whenever someone writes a 4 like a 9.

title: Curve Ball
insight: You're refining your curvature detection. The difference between a 3 and a 5 is haunting your dreams.

title: Edge Lord
insight: Your edge detectors are getting sharp. You can see the sharp corner of a 4 vs the curve of a 9.

title: Feature Rich
insight: You're combining features now. A loop plus a stick equals a 6. Or a 9. You're still not sure.

title: Pattern Matcher
insight: You're recognizing actual patterns instead of just pixel stats. You feel smarter than a coin flip.

title: Bias Buster
insight: You've overcome your early biases. You no longer think everything is a 1 just because it's easy.

title: Valley Hiker
insight: You're navigating the loss landscape. You know where the ridges are, but the valleys are deep.

title: Plateau
insight: You're stuck. You keep making the same mistakes on the same 5s and 3s. Push through it.

title: Detail Oriented
insight: You're looking at the tiny details now. The way a stroke curls up or down matters.

title: Contour King
insight: You're following the contours of the digits. The 8 is finally separating from the 3.

title: Basin Instinct
insight: You've found a good local minimum. It's cozy here, but you're still getting the weird ones wrong.

title: Near Perfect
insight: You're getting the easy ones 100% right. Only the truly terrible handwriting fools you now.

title: Grandmaster
insight: Your filters are crisp. Your confidence is high. You can tell a closed 4 from a 9 at a glance.

title: Singularity
insight: You have memorized the manifold. You see the matrix. You are the model.
